attributes.action: put up a candidate to fight David Davis at the forthcoming by-election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition is seeking to have a public and informed debate on the damage to personal liberties that have been and are taking place under the current government. The outcome of the debate would then be concluded by an "informed" eletoral vote and not by "focus groups", public opinion polls, or the views of a few powerful press barons.
